tutorials.title: Introduction
tutorials.description: This is an introduction to installing and exploring the Oracle Database 23ai Free

tutorials.title: Get Started
tutorials.description: This is the prerequisites for customers using Free Trial and Paid tenancies, and Always Free accounts (if applicable). The title of the lab and the Contents Menu title (the title above) match for Prerequisite lab. This lab is always first.

tutorials.title: Lab 1: Developer Role
tutorials.description: Establish and configure a dedicated developer role, streamlining development activities within the database.

tutorials.title: Lab 2: AI Vector Search
tutorials.description: Try out AI Vector search in 23ai

tutorials.title: Lab 4: SQL Firewall
tutorials.description: Fortify your database security with SQL Firewall, protecting against unauthorized access and potential threats.

tutorials.title: Need Help?
tutorials.description: Template to link to Need Help lab at the end of workshop. Change 'CHANGE-ME' in link below to need-help-livelabs.md or need-help-freetier.md
